scenario_text.value:
The big building the professor mentioned was
this way.

Appearance-wise, nothing’s changed since we
explored before.
Agumon, do you sense any other Kemonogami?

When I sense something bad it’s usually
really strong.

But sometimes enemies appear when I didn’t
sense anything at all.

(I guess his senses aren’t on point every
time.)

(It’s unsettling not knowing what’ll pop out,
not to mention how old this place is...)

(Who knows why the professor was so
interested in this building...)

(Maybe there are some clues about our enemy,
or this world, or how to get home?)
(It’s no time to be a scaredy-cat.)

(I’ve gotta be brave to get everyone back
safely.)

(I’ve gotta be brave to make sure we don’t
lose anyone else.)

And be ready for the enemy to appear at any
moment!

Yeah!
I hope we find something useful!
